attributes.action: Close the border,Declare a state of national emergency & mass deportations
attributes.additional_details: Our sovereignty is being threatened and the labour government aren’t doing anything about it
attributes.background: The country is being invaded by illegal immigrants . THIS MUST STOP !!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by mass deportations, as the UK already has a policy of deporting illegal migrants. Additionally, the UK does not have a "state of emergency" declaration within the UK legal framework.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 
Deport all illegal migrants in the United Kingdom: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729231
